Articles.Content:
Remember when you went up to 20km and then instantly turned 45 degrees west?

 

Pepperidge Farm remembers...

 

Do you?

Remember when SSTOs where covered in intakes?

I do. It was called air-hogging.
Remember when every major part mod had lo-res texture packs, else you couldn't use it?

Remember when there were these things called "Kraken Drives?"

Most recent, in the 1.1 pre release, you could just clip wheels and get infinite acceleration. Before that was deployable gear drives, the 750m/s barrier, and the short lived age of Kraken Drive SSTO's. Before that was this wonderful thing called "Infiniglide" which allowed the circumnavigation of Kerbin in 15 minutes or less. And before that was the pioneer of Kraken Drives, the same glitch which powered it still exists today.

Pepperidge Farm remembers the FTL Egg.
Remember when Pluto was still a planet? Pepperidge Farm remembers...

Remember when Emiko Station and Forgotten Space Program didn't exist? CAKE99 Space Corporation remembers.

[joke]Remember when your mum was not the size of Jool? Oh wait no one remembers that because it never happened[/joke]

Remember when you had to go to a place called spaceport to download mods?

Pepperidge Farm remembers... Do you?

Remember when you could only have one flight in progress?

Pepperidge Farm remembers...
Remember when the radial intake looked like something you'd put on an old, obnoxiously loud car? Pepperidge Farm remembers...

Remember when it was cool to put a leather LeBra on the front of your Camaro or similar car?

Pepperidge Farm remembers....it wishes it didn't, but it does. Pepperidge Farm always remembers.
